Title: Relates to prohibiting the registration of mortgages in default prior to the filing of a notice of pendency
Summary: Prohibits the registration of mortgages in default prior to the filing of a notice of pendency.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to prohibiting the registration of mortgages in default prior to the filing of a notice of pendency
